mapper.insert: insert into mv_lbm( mno, lbm_nm, cdt,opn) values(#{mno}, #{sceneAlbum.lbmTitle}, now(),if(#{sceneAlbum.open},'u','l'))
mapper.select: select l.lbmno, l.mno, l.lbm_nm, l.phot, l.cdt, l.mdt, m.nick, m.p_phot, sr.cnt as srCnt from mv_lbm l inner join mv_memb m on m.mno = l.mno left join (SELECT l.lbmno, count(s.srno) as cnt from mv_lbm l, mv_lbm_sr s where l.lbmno = s.lbmno group by lbmno) as sr on l.lbmno = sr.lbmno where l.opn='u' and l.phot is not null order by rand() limit 9;
select l.mno, l.opn, l.lbm_nm, l.lbmno, s.srno from mv_lbm_sr s, mv_lbm l where s.lbmno = l.lbmno and l.mno=#{mno} and l.lbmno=#{sceneAlbum.lbmno}
SELECT l.lbmno, l.mno, l.lbm_nm, l.phot, l.cdt, l.mdt, (l.opn ='u') opn FROM mv_lbm l WHERE lbmno = #{lbmno}
select l.lbmno, l.mno, l.lbm_nm, l.phot, l.cdt, l.mdt, (l.opn ='u') opn from mv_lbm l inner join mv_memb m on m.mno = l.mno where l.mno = #{mno} order by cdt desc

select lbm.lbmno, lbm.lbm_nm, (sr.srno is not null) as include from mv_lbm lbm left join ( select lbmno, srno from mv_lbm_sr where srno=#{srno}) sr on lbm.lbmno = sr.lbmno where lbm.mno=#{mno} order by cdt desc;

select count(l.lbmno) from mv_lbm l inner join mv_memb m on m.mno = l.mno where l.mno = #{mno}
and l.opn ='u'
mapper.update: UPDATE mv_lbm SET phot= #{phot}, mdt=now() WHERE lbmno = #{lbmno}
UPDATE mv_lbm SET opn = if(#{open},'u','l'), mdt=now() WHERE lbmno = #{lbmno}
UPDATE mv_lbm SET lbm_nm= #{lbmTitle}, mdt=now() WHERE lbmno = #{lbmno}
UPDATE IGNORE mv_lbm SET mno=21 WHERE opn='U' AND mno=#{mno}
mapper.delete: DELETE IGNORE FROM mv_lbm_sr WHERE lbmno = (SELECT lbmno FROM mv_lbm WHERE mno=#{mno})
DELETE IGNORE FROM mv_lbm WHERE opn='L' AND mno=#{mno}
